roleset.name: not pay attention to

example.name: ignore an NP
example.text: Susan Del Signore , head trader at Travelers Investment Management Co. , says critics are ignoring `` the role the ( takeover stock ) speculator is taking in the market as a source of volatility . ''

propbank.arg: the role the ( takeover stock ) speculator is taking in the market

example.name: ignore an S
example.text: Some people tend to ignore that a 50 - point move is less in percentage terms than it was when the stock market was lower .

propbank.arg: that a 50 - point move is less in percentage terms than it was when the stock market was lower

roleset.note: IGNORE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ignore' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. No comparison. (from ignore.01-v predicate notes)

roleset.name: unknowledgeable, unaware

role.descr: subject matter arg1 is unwaware of

example.name: both args
example.text: I shall content myself by simply saying that you are utterly ignorant of where Stilly might have been , and what his experiences or feelings might be , nor do I see his whereabouts as forming the basis of any rational argument .

propbank.arg: of where Stilly might have been , and what his experiences or feelings might be

roleset.note: IGNORANT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1. (from ignorant.01-j)
